content: Is accepting _format=json just a convention (as opposed to _format=application/json+fhir? Is it documented anywhere?
As far as I know, everything documented about this is here: http://hl7.org/fhir/http.html#mime-type
Ah, that's what I wanted, thanks! I was looking under search.html, which doesn't mention these shorthand terms.
I had the same question earlier this month and I also looked under search.html first.

I'll add a tracker item asking to cross-reference.
--> 9878
So, I think _format=json is not valid anymore? As mentioned elsewhere, Spark still supports that
